review: *** **** ************ * **** ******** **** ******* *** he's so polite and clear n explaining everything.. guides us always and responds when we need doc in emergency though he s busy which other doc's don do often, thank you doc üôè

Dr Prakash Desai, very kind, polite and friendly with the patients. We consulted him for our daughter medical condition, he has lot of patience and explained us all the options. We are very happy with the outcome and would love to recommend Dr Desai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very friendly and takes care of the baby well. He explains everything that needs to be done and the reasons for doing the same. He is a very approachable doctor and answers to all your queries.

** * **** ** **** **** ****** ***** *** ***** * **** ** ** ** **** ******* ** *** ******* *** **** ******* ***** * **** ****** ********* He was ignorant to answer our questions. In 5 mins of visit, he received 2 calls and later started seeing his laptop. After paying 850 for the visit, I wouldn't expect this behaviour from a doctor in Cloudnine.
